flavorText:
"They have forsaken their vows. The edict of the Circle demands their voices be silenced."
—Syr Tasdale, knight of Ardenvale

foreignData.flavorText:
„Sie haben ihre Gelübde vergessen. Das Edikt des Kreises der Loyalität verlangt, dass ihre Stimmen verstummen."
—Syr Tasdale, Ritter von Ardenthal
foreignData.name: Ohrenbetäubende Stille
foreignData.text: Kein Spieler kann mehr als einen Nichtkreatur-Zauberspruch pro Zug wirken.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Han traicionado sus juramentos. El edicto del Círculo exige que se silencien sus voces".
—Syr Tasdale, caballero del Valle de Arden
foreignData.name: Silencio ensordecedor
foreignData.text: Ningún jugador puede lanzar más de un hechizo que no sea de criatura cada turno.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Ils ont renoncé à leurs serments. L'édit du Cercle exige que leurs voix soient réduites au silence. »
—Syr Tasdale, chevalier d'Ardenval
foreignData.name: Silence assourdissant
foreignData.text: Aucun joueur ne peut lancer plus d'un sort non-créature par tour.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Sono venuti meno al loro giuramento. L'editto del Circolo esige che le loro voci siano messe a tacere."
—Syr Tasdale, cavaliere di Ardenvalle
foreignData.name: Silenzio Assordante
foreignData.text: Ogni giocatore non può lanciare più di una magia non creatura per turno.

foreignData.flavorText:
「彼らは自らの誓いを捨てたのだ。円環の布告により、その声は封じられる。」
――アーデンベイルの騎士、タズデイル卿
foreignData.name: 耳の痛い静寂
foreignData.text: 各プレイヤーは、毎ターン１つしかクリーチャーでない呪文を唱えられない。

foreignData.flavorText:
"그들은 맹세를 저버렸다. 원의 칙령은 그들의 목소리를 없애라고 명령한다."
—아르덴베일의 기사, 타스데일 경
foreignData.name: 귀를 멀게 하는 정적
foreignData.text: 각 플레이어는 생물이 아닌 주문을 매 턴 한 개를 초과해서 발동할 수 없다.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Eles quebraram os próprios votos. O édito da Roda demanda o silenciamento de suas vozes."
— Syr Tasdale, cavaleiro do Vale Arden
foreignData.name: Silêncio Ensurdecedor
foreignData.text: Cada jogador não pode conjurar mais de uma mágica que não seja de criatura a cada turno.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Они нарушили свои обеты. Эдикт Круга требует заглушить их голоса».
— сейр Тасдейл, рыцарь Арденвейла
foreignData.name: Оглушительная Тишина
foreignData.text: Каждый игрок не может разыгрывать более одного не являющегося существом заклинания в каждом ходу.

foreignData.flavorText:
「他们背弃誓约，言而无信。因此焰圈裁令他们从此言而无声。」
～雅登瓦骑士，塔戴尔爵士
foreignData.name: 震撼寂静
foreignData.text: 每位牌手每回合所施放的非生物咒语不能多于一个。

foreignData.flavorText:
「他們背棄誓約，言而無信。因此焰圈裁令他們從此言而無聲。」
～雅登瓦騎士，塔戴爾爵士
foreignData.name: 震撼寂靜
foreignData.text: 每位玩家每回合所施放的非生物咒語不能多於一個。

name: Deafening Silence
originalText: Each player can't cast more than one noncreature spell each turn.

rulings.text: Players may cast any number of creature spells plus one noncreature spell each turn.

Deafening Silence will look at the entire turn to see if a player has cast a noncreature spell yet that turn, even if Deafening Silence wasn't on the battlefield when that spell was cast. Notably, you can't cast Deafening Silence and then cast another noncreature spell that turn.
If you cast a noncreature spell that was countered, you can't cast another noncreature spell that turn.

text: Each player can't cast more than one noncreature spell each turn.
